Package com.ae2dms.UI.Game

Class DraggableFloorController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.UI.Game.DraggableFloorController
public class DraggableFloorController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller for DraggableFloorPane contains mouse event handlers and utils for the dragging and dropping

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) javafx.scene.image.ImageView chosenView
    The ImageView for Floor selected for dragging
    private javafx.scene.layout.Pane DraggableFloor
    The Pane reserved for adding draggable floor into
    private java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.image.ImageView> DragList
    ArrayList of JavaFX ImageView of Draggable Nodes
    private GameDocument gameDocument  
    private static javafx.scene.image.ImageView preview
    Preview image of Floor, will be semi-transparent
    private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane previewGrid
    The First Level grid to add preview Floor when dragging and hovering Floor behind

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DraggableFloorController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void addDraggableItem()
    add one draggable Floor on the screen has pop up animation
    private void draggingOnMouseReleased​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    called when mouse release dragging if the position of mouse is within Grid, then put the Floor into designated position else put the Floor back to side
    private void previewDragging​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    called each time mouse hold and moves position the draggable node under the mouse cursor or place the preview image to underneath grid position
    (package private) void refreshDragList()
    refresh all the dragging to sync with the count in Level
    private void rePositionDragging()
    re structure of all the dragging in a list on the side
    private void selectDragging​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    called when user click on a draggable Floor

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
